attributes.action: Give parents their rights back to enable them to discipline their children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children in this country have become unruly due to parents having the right to discipline their own children taken away. You are no longer allowed to ground a child for being naughty...it breaks their civil rights, you are not even allowed to restrain your child anymore unless it is done in a certain way. The children in this country have the law on their side and if nothing is done to give parents their rights back, things will only get worse!
